identification.name: M7: Video 4 / SSQ
identification.desc:
Erratum on Video:

At Time 9:33, I mention segment "ten thousand..". I meant "Segment 1010"..... The example uses segments with sequence numbers 1000, 1006, and 1010. There is no segment with a sequence number "ten thousand.."

Ideally for these self-study questions, you should perform these tasks in this order:

  1. Consult Slide #28 to know about the reading assignments.
  2. Complete the reading assignments.
  3. Watch the video (see below) as many times as you wish.

identification.name: M9: Video 1 / Pre-Review
identification.desc:
This is a pre-review of ALL material covered in this module (Part I IP). I advise you to take only ONE attempt and finish all the module before the remaining attempts.

Ideally for these self-study questions, you should perform these tasks in this order:

  1. Consult Slide #3 to know about the reading assignments (Only Chapter 5 from textbook).
  2. Complete the reading assignments.
  3. Watch the video (see below) as many times as you wish.
  4. Take only ONE attempt.
  5. Complete all self study questions.
  6. After completing the FULL module, take the remaining attempts.

This quiz is optional. It is similar to M11:Class Quiz. You can takeÂ  twice and the highest score will be recorded.Â  If you score on this quiz, you will get a bonus of toÂ  be added to your total score on Canvas. For example, if you get 80 on this score,Â will be added to your total score to determine your final letter grade.

This is a BONUS: its weight is 0% for your Canvas total.

This quiz is available to take until noon Monday November4. You cannot take it after.
